about.description:
Welcome to Verilator, the fastest Verilog HDL simulator.
  • Accepts synthesizable Verilog or SystemVerilog
  • Performs lint code-quality checks
  • Compiles into multithreaded C++, or SystemC
  • Creates XML to front-end your own tools
Fast
  • Outperforms many commercial simulators
  • Single- and multi-threaded output models
Widely Used
  • Wide industry and academic deployment
  • Out-of-the-box support from Arm, and RISC-V vendor IP
Community Driven & Openly Licensed
  • Guided by the CHIPS Alliance and Linux Foundation
  • Open, and free as in both speech and beer
  • More simulation for your verification budget
Commercial Support Available
  • Commercial support contracts
  • Design support contracts
  • Enhancement contracts

name: verilator-debug
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: verilator-debug
  version: '4.034'
source:
  patches:
    - patches/0001-Use-usr-bin-env-perl-in-lieu-of-usr-bin-perl.patch
    - patches/0002-Fix-build-with-Bison-3.7-and-newer-2505.patch
    - patches/0003-Fix-missing-install-of-vl_file_copy-vl_hier_graph-31.patch
    - patches/0004-add-message-suggesting-verilator-debug-package.patch
  sha256: 17a087fc74fd1ab035a43ba38d6f6198150ee11b20077855404ddb4c1620c6b7
  url: https://github.com/verilator/verilator/archive/v4.034.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '3'
  script: install.sh
  string: h694c41f_3
requirements:
  build: []
  run:
    - verilator 4.034 h6fbc5c6_3
test:
  requires:
    - clang_osx-64 12.*
    - clangxx_osx-64 12.*
    - cmake
    - graphviz
    - pkgconfig
    - python >=3
about:
  description: "Welcome to Verilator, the fastest Verilog HDL simulator.\n  \u2022\
    \ Accepts synthesizable Verilog or SystemVerilog\n  \u2022 Performs lint code-quality\
    \ checks\n  \u2022 Compiles into multithreaded C++, or SystemC\n  \u2022 Creates\
    \ XML to front-end your own tools\nFast\n  \u2022 Outperforms many commercial\
    \ simulators\n  \u2022 Single- and multi-threaded output models\nWidely Used\n\
    \  \u2022 Wide industry and academic deployment\n  \u2022 Out-of-the-box support\
    \ from Arm, and RISC-V vendor IP\nCommunity Driven & Openly Licensed\n  \u2022\
    \ Guided by the CHIPS Alliance and Linux Foundation\n  \u2022 Open, and free as\
    \ in both speech and beer\n  \u2022 More simulation for your verification budget\n\
    Commercial Support Available\n  \u2022 Commercial support contracts\n  \u2022\
    \ Design support contracts\n  \u2022 Enhancement contracts\n"
  dev_url: https://github.com/verilator/verilator
  doc_url: https://www.veripool.org/projects/verilator/wiki/Documentation
  home: https://veripool.org/wiki/verilator
  license: LGPL-3.0-only OR Artistic-2.0
  license_file:
    - Artistic
    - LICENSE
  summary: The fastest Verilog HDL simulator
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - timsnyder
